item.title: BvFL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BvFL1 Gene Name: FLC-like 1 Genome: Species: Beta vulgaris Functional Descriptions: EcoTILLING in Beta vulgaris reveals polymorphisms in the FLC-like gene BvFL1that are associated with annuality and winter hardiness.
